title: LIVE COVERAGE: Amber Heard Testifies Against Johnny Depp
description:
Joe Biden declared 70 million Americans to be the most extremist organization America has ever seen. We tell him who the extremists really are. HINT: Look in the mirror. We also explain the Roe v. Wade issue slowly enough for Dave Portnoy to understand. And we’re going LIVE with Amber Heard’s testimony. #AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #MAGA
